info.name: Tax Filing API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Tax Filing Backend Service with example request bodies.

request.description: Register a new user account
Login as a taxpayer (sample data user)
Refresh an expired access token
Get the currently authenticated user's info
Create a new tax filing for a specific year and jurisdiction
Get a specific filing with all items
Get all filings for the current user (paginated)
Get filings by status (DRAFT, READY, SUBMITTED)
Get all filings for a specific tax year
Mark a DRAFT filing as READY for submission
Move a READY filing back to DRAFT
Delete a draft filing
Create an amendment for a submitted filing
Get all amendments for an original filing
Add employment income with T4 slip details
Add investment income (interest, dividends)
Add self-employment/business income
Add rental property income
Add capital gains from asset sales
Update an existing income item
Remove an income item from a filing
Add RRSP contribution deduction
Add charitable donation deduction
Add union/professional dues deduction
Add childcare expenses deduction
Add home office expenses deduction
Update an existing deduction item
Remove a deduction item from a filing
Claim basic personal amount tax credit
Claim Canada Employment Amount credit
Claim GST/HST refundable credit
Claim Climate Action Incentive refundable credit
Update an existing credit claim
Remove a credit claim from a filing
Run tax calculation for a filing using active rules
Get the most recent calculation for a filing
Get all calculation runs for a filing
Submit a READY filing for processing
Get submission record for a specific filing
Get all submissions for the current user
Look up a submission by its confirmation number
Get the active tax rule version for a jurisdiction and year
Get a specific tax rule version by ID
Login as an admin (sample data user)
Create a new tax rule version (DRAFT status)
Add a progressive tax bracket to a rule version
Add second tax bracket (20.5%)
Add top tax bracket with no upper limit (33%)
Add a non-refundable tax credit rule
Add a refundable tax credit rule with phase-out
Add a deduction rule with limits
Activate a DRAFT rule version (deactivates any existing active version)
Deprecate an active rule version
Get all rule versions by status (DRAFT, ACTIVE, DEPRECATED)
Get all rule versions for a jurisdiction
Get audit history for a specific entity (tax_filing, income_item, etc.)
Get all audit records for a specific user

item.name: Get Audit History by Entity Type

request.description: Get all audit records for an entity type
Basic health status
Kubernetes liveness probe
Kubernetes readiness probe
Prometheus format metrics
List all available metrics
